summary: When a famous author is assaulted in a shady part of the city, Hannah and her team investigate. They stumble upon a prostitution network involving college students.
cast: Veerle Baetens|Michael Pas|Marc Lauwrys|Gilles De Schryver|Geert Van Rampelberg|Jurgen Delnaet|Nathalie Meskens|Peter De Graef|Maaike Neuville|Aline Van Hulle|Carry Goossens|Ben Segers|Manou Kersting|Nick De Vucht|Karlijn Sonderen|Aagje Vanthomme|Mark Verstraete|Stef Wauters
title: Code 37
